import React from 'react'; import {FadeIn} from 'react-slide-fade-in'; import amani_pic from '../media/amani.jpg'; import "../styles/home.css"; const Home = () => { return (

About

I am an incoming PhD student at MIT Brain & Cognitive Sciences, where I will research cognition by studying human and artificial intelligence in tandem. I am excited about using artificial intelligence as a scientific tool to study how the mind works, and using what we know about the mind to develop more cognitively-realistic models. My work will be supported by the School of Science Dean's Fellowship.

I earned my Bachelor's with high distinction and departmental honors in Computer Science and Mathematics from Harvey Mudd College, where I worked with George Montañez in the AMISTAD lab. My work was supported by the Astronaut Scholarship and earned the CRA Outstanding Undergraduate Researcher Award.
); } export default Home;
